General.Name: Guangdong Wencan Die Casting Co Ltd
General.Description: Wencan Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive aluminum alloy precision die castings in China and internationally. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Wencan Die Casting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wencan Group Co.,Ltd. in July 2021. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

8.Name: Mr. Xinhua  Zhang
8.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board, Mang. of Production & Technology Department
